posts.title: Giant Cocktail Shaker
posts.content: Whether you’re a raging alcoholic or just have a lot of guests to serve, the giant cocktail shaker is perfect for preparing  a bulk order of drinks in a single mixing session. No matter your tolerance, one or two drinks is all you’ll need to relax.

posts.title: Chin Supporting Travel Pillow
posts.content: Keep your head from bobbing around while you’re trying to catch some Z’s by bringing aboard this chin supporting travel pillow. This super soft machine washable pillows gently wraps around your neck to provide full support while you’re sleeping upright.

posts.title: Powerline Coffee Cup
posts.content: Power up all your electronic devices while on the road with the powerline coffee cup in your daily driver. Styled to look like a standard coffee cup, it fits perfectly into cup holders and provides a 120V outlet so you can power everything from a laptop to microwave.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Snow
posts.content: Enjoy the fun of winter year round with glow in the dark snow. With just a little water, the snow expands to 10 times its size and glows in the dark when the lights go out. The snow is reusable, completely safe to play with, and won’t leave your hands cold after contact.

posts.title: Feline Yoga Mats
posts.content: Save your furniture and floor from claw marks by placing your kitty on these feline yoga mats. They’re available in a range of vibrant colors and provide the ideal spot for your kitty to scratch and sharpen his claws without ruining your furniture.

posts.title: Easy-Cycling Interchangeable Wrench Set
posts.content: Carry a toolbox’s worth of supplies in your back pocket with this easy-cycling interchangeable wrench set. The versatile design of this stainless steel tool allows you to sift through the differently sized wrenches using just your thumb.

posts.title: Medieval Weapon Push Pins
posts.content: Give your office corkboard a taste of the macabre with Medieval weapon push pins, the only push pins that are manufactured after real weapons of the Dark Ages. You can exact revenge on expense accounts or employee contact lists with daggers, axes, and swords.

posts.title: Unicorn Pool Float
posts.content: Add a whimsical touch to your magical pool day by lounging around on this unicorn pool float. This 45 inch wide tube is made from premium vinyl raft material that’s 25% thicker than traditional floats and comes with a rapid-inflate valve for quick inflation.

posts.title: Hands Free Bicycle Leash
posts.content: Safely walk your pooch while you enjoy a nice ride by using this hands free bicycle leash. It’s composed from a long stainless steel rod that’s complemented by a military-grade paracord leash designed to keep your doggy at a safe lateral distance while you pedal.

posts.title: Beer-Can Chicken Rack & Drip Pan
posts.content: Prepare a mouth-watering poultry feast for all your friends and family with the beer-can chicken rack and drip pan. Using this stainless steel rack you can grill up a delicious beer infused chicken without creating a big greasy mess.

posts.title: The Manual To Manhood Book
posts.content: Learn the essential skills every guy needs to know to succeed in life from the pages of the “Manual to Manhood” book. This informative read will teach you everything from changing a tire to clearing a sink drain so you can earn your Man card.

posts.title: Vegetable Spiral Slicer
posts.content: Make fruits and veggies more appealing for the kids by cutting them up using this vegetable spiral slicer. It’s made from durable plastic and comes with three different steel blade attachments you can use to create  create thick, spaghetti-like, or ribbon-like strands.
